properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 7 at 11:22AM EST until February 7 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in
low lying areas due to tidal flooding.

* WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon, especially around the
time of high tide.

* IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only
isolated road closures expected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above
normal. The next high tide at Point Lookout is at 11:53 AM. The
next high tide at Piney Point is at 12:32 PM. The next high tide
at Coltons Point is at 1:08 PM.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
